item.title: Can collagen supplements improve your skin? Here's what the research shows

item.title: Grab the goggles. Pickleball eye injuries are on the rise
item.description: Safety precautions haven't caught up with enthusiasm for the sport. Researchers call for a new push for eye-ware.

item.title: For four years she hid her Parkinson's diagnosis. Then she let a reporter follow her journey.
item.description: Dr. Sue Goldie and New York Times reporter John Branch recount how a private, years-long conversation about her Parkinson's became a public story.

item.title: A caregiver's survival guide: Advice from people who've been there
item.description: Family caregivers offer their wit, wisdom and survival tips for the hardest unpaid job in America.

item.title: Intense mental exercise may be able to offset the effects of aging, research finds
item.description: A new study shows that cognitive training can increase the levels of a key chemical messenger in the brain responsible for decision-making.

item.title: After Chiding Democrats on Transgender Politics, Newsom Vetoes a Key Health Measure
